description: The file defines a ViewModel class `SearchViewModel` for handling search queries related to weather locations, including debounced search input handling, state management, and interactions with the `WeatherRepository`. It also contains a data class `SearchState` that maintains the UI state related to search.

classes.name: SearchState
classes.description: Data class representing the UI state for search, including query text, status message, results summary, loading indicator, and error message.

classes.name: SearchViewModel
classes.description: An Android ViewModel managing search logic, including query updates, debounce handling, and state management for weather location searches.

methods.name: updateQuery
methods.description: Updates the search query, performs debounce delay, calls the weather repository search, and updates the UI state based on the result.
